author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-2368. Allow computePolicies() to be called in isolation. I also created a new connectCompositeReferencesAndServices() method to isolate the recursive composition processing that has to come before computePolicies(). I added a compositePolicyBuilderImpl to show how these new methods could be used.
